extensionDescription.message: This add-on provides help to answer questions on Twitter using the hashtag #fxhelp, gives some tips, has built-in common replies and explains how the Social Support program works.
extensionDescription.description: This add-on provides help to answer questions on Twitter using the hashtag #fxhelp, gives some tips, has built-in common replies and explains how the Social Support program works.

note.message: Note: This Add-on is completely free! Please consider make a small donation or write an review at addons.mozilla.org. Thank you!

bugs.message: If you find any bugs, have any suggestions or some ideas for this add-on: Please create a new issue.

works.message: This extension provides help to answer questions on Twitter using the hashtag #fxhelp, gives some tips, has built-in common replies and explains how the Social Support program works.

links.message: The add-on counts with the following useful links, which will help you take the first steps and start contributing:
